short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extention generates and returns links from a customer's Printfection Giveaway.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Leverage Printfection's swag platform to easily generate Giveaway redemption URLs on the fly. Just choose the campaign you want to use, click a button, and you'll be provided with a new one-time-use Giveaway link. You can also view your recently created links for reference later.
